archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.1.2b: b) detail the types of information needed to assist information security incident management (e.g. security event log data, network configuration diagrams and information classification details)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
